name: m3u-editor
tagline: A web based tool for editing sorting and managing M3U playlists
description: M3U Editor is a web-based tool for editing and managing M3U playlists. Useful for IPTV and media streaming setups, it allows sorting, filtering, and customizing entries for media players.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import and modify M3U/M3U8 playlists with drag-and-drop reordering for IPTV and media streaming

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search and filter entries by name, group, or URL to quickly locate specific streams

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Save edited playlists in multiple formats compatible with various media players

features.title: Group Management
features.description: Organize channels into custom categories for easier navigation and access

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Check stream URLs for availability and responsiveness before saving
